General.Name: MyHealthChecked Plc
General.Description: MyHealthChecked PLC develops and commercializes at-home healthcare and wellness tests in the United Kingdom. It offers nutritional health tests, such as intolerances and sensitivities DNA tests, and vitamins and minerals DNA tests; weight management tests, that includes weight management DNA tests and glucose management DNA tests; and cardiovascular health tests, such as heart profile test DNA test under MyHealthChecked brand. The company also provides MyLotus, a testing strip; and RNA and COVID-19 tests. The company was formerly known as Concepta PLC and changed its name to MyHealthChecked PLC in December 2020. MyHealthChecked PLC was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Cardiff, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Maltings, Cardiff, United Kingdom, CF24 5EA
